alert.note: Alert for Perry; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 11:13AM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri...Illinois... Mississippi River at St. Louis. Mississippi River at Hannibal. Mississippi River at Grafton. Mississippi River at Mel Price LD. Mississippi River at Winfield. Mississippi River at Clarksville. Mississippi River at Chester. Mississippi River at Louisiana. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Chester. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 33.5 feet, Water Street in Chester begins flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 31.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM CDT Saturday was 31.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 33.5 feet early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Mississippi River Chester 27.0 31.4 33.2 33.5 32.6 30.8 28.7 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
